#Load the diamonds dataset
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data("diamonds")
summary(diamonds)
```

Create a scatterplot of price vs x. using the ggplot syntax.

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = price, y = x), data = diamonds) +
  geom_point()
```
